languages.text: At the beginning of the combat, the wearer gains the shadow field effect. While under this effect, the wearer counts as being in a {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} against all {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}. The effect is lost when the wearer is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by a ranged attack and suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from it.

traits.locale_text: At the beginning of the combat, the wielder gains the shadow field effect. While under this effect, the wielder counts as being in a full cover against all ranged attacks. The effect is lost when the wielder is hit by a ranged attack and suffers damage from it.

At the beginning of the combat, the wearer gains the shadow field effect. While under this effect, the wearer counts as being in a full cover against all ranged attacks. The effect is lost when the wearer is hit by a ranged attack and suffers damage from it.

At the beginning of the combat, the wearer gains the shadow field effect. While under this effect, the wearer counts as being in a {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} against all {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}. The effect is lost when the wearer is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by a ranged attack and suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from it.

At the beginning of the combat, the wearer gains the shadow field effect. While under this effect, the wearer counts as being in a {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} against all {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}. The effect is lost when the wearer is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by a ranged attack and suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from it.

languages.text: Al principio del combate, el portador gana el efecto Campo de sombra. Este efecto hace que el portador cuente como si estuviera en {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura total{/g} contra todos los {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ataques a distancia{/g}. El efecto se pierde si el {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} de un ataque a distancia causa {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daños{/g} al portador.
languages.original_text: At the beginning of the combat, the wearer gains the shadow field effect. While under this effect, the wearer counts as being in a {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} against all {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}. The effect is lost when the wearer is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by a ranged attack and suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from it.

traits.locale_text: Al principio del combate, el portador gana el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} Campo de sombra. Este efecto hace que el portador cuente como si estuviera en {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura total{/g} contra todos los ataques a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}distancia{/g}. El efecto se pierde si el {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} de un ataque a distancia causa daños al portador.

languages.text: 战斗开始时，装备者获得“暗影领域”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}。在此效果下，当装备者受到所有{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}远程{/g}攻击时，始终视为处于{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}全身掩体{/g}之中。当装备者被远程攻击{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}，受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，此效果失效。
languages.original_text: At the beginning of the combat, the wearer gains the shadow field {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}. While under this effect, the wearer counts as being in a {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} against all {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks. The effect is lost when the wearer is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by a ranged attack and suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from it.

traits.locale_text: 战斗开始时，装备者获得“暗影领域”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}。在此效果下，当装备者受到所有{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}攻击时，始终视为处于{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}全身掩体{/g}之中。当装备者被远程攻击{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}，受到伤害时，此效果失效。

languages.text: Au début du combat, l'utilisateur acquiert l'effet Champ d'ombres. Tant qu'il bénéficie de cet effet, il dispose d'une {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture totale{/g} contre toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}attaques à distance{/g}. L'effet se dissipe lorsque l'utilisateur est {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touché{/g} par une attaque à distance qui lui inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}.
languages.original_text: At the beginning of the combat, the wearer gains the shadow field effect. While under this effect, the wearer counts as being in a {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} against all {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}. The effect is lost when the wearer is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by a ranged attack and suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from it.

traits.locale_text: Au début du combat, l'utilisateur acquiert l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} Champ d'Ombres. Tant qu'il bénéficie de cet effet, il dispose d'une {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture totale{/g} contre toutes les attaques {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g}. L'effet se dissipe lorsque l'utilisateur est {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touché{/g} et qu'il subit des dégâts dans le cadre d'une attaque à distance dont il est la cible.

languages.text: Zu Beginn des Kampfes erhält der Träger den Effekt "Schattenfeld". Unter dem Einfluss dieses Effektes hat der Träger {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}volle Deckung{/g} gegen alle {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}Fernkampfangriffe{/g}. Wenn der Träger von einem Fernkampfangriff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffen{/g} wird und {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} erleidet, wird der Effekt aufgehoben.
languages.original_text: At the beginning of the combat, the wearer gains the shadow field effect. While under this effect, the wearer counts as being in a {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} against all {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}. The effect is lost when the wearer is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by a ranged attack and suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from it.

traits.locale_text: Zu Beginn des Kampfes erhält der Träger den {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} Schattenfeld. Unter dem Einfluss dieses Effekts zählt der Träger als in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}voller Deckung{/g} gegen alle {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfangriffe{/g}. Wenn der Träger von einem Fernkampfangriff {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}getroffen{/g} wird und Schaden erleidet, wird der Effekt aufgehoben.

languages.text: 戦闘開始時に、使用者はシャドウフィールド{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}を獲得する。この効果がある場合、使用者はすべての{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠隔{/g}攻撃に対して{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}完全にカバー{/g}された状態とみなされる。この効果は、使用者に遠隔攻撃が{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}し、その{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けた場合は失われる。
languages.original_text: At the beginning of the combat, the wearer gains the shadow field {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}. While under this effect, the wearer counts as being in a {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} against all {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks. The effect is lost when the wearer is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by a ranged attack and suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from it.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘開始時に、使用者はシャドウフィールド{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}を獲得する。この効果がある場合、使用者はすべての{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠隔{/g}攻撃に対して {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}完全にカバー{/g}された状態とみなされる。この効果は、使用者に遠隔攻撃が{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}ヒット{/g}し、そのダメージを受けた場合は失われる。

languages.text: В начале боя персонаж получает эффект "теневое поле". Для {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}дистанционных атак{/g} считается, что персонаж, на которого действует этот эффект, находится в полном {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытии{/g}. Эффект снимается, когда персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} от дистанционной атаки.
languages.original_text: At the beginning of the combat, the wearer gains the shadow field effect. While under this effect, the wearer counts as being in a {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} against all {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}. The effect is lost when the wearer is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by a ranged attack and suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from it.

traits.locale_text: В начале боя персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} "теневое поле". Для {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дистанционных{/g} атак считается, что персонаж, на которого действует этот эффект, находится в {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}полном укрытии{/g}. Эффект снимается, когда персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g} и урон от дальней атаки.

В начале боя персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} "теневое поле". Для {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дистанционных{/g} атак считается, что персонаж, на которого действует этот эффект, находится в {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}полном укрытии{/g}. Эффект снимается, когда персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g} и урон от дальней атаки.
